name: Neurology
detail: Neurology is the branch of medicine concerned with the study and treatment of the nervous system.

name: Hematology
detail: Traumatology: The branch of surgery that deals with injured patients, usually on an emergency basis.

name: Pulmonology
detail: Pulmonology or pneumology is a medical specialty that deals with diseases involving the respiratory tract.

name: Cardiology
detail: Cardiology is a branch of medicine that deals with the disorders of the heart as well as some parts of the circulatory system.

name: Ophthalmology
detail: Ophthalmologists diagnose and treat injuries, infections, diseases, and disorders of the eye. Treatments can taken orally or topically surgery.

name: Orthopedics
detail: Orthopedics is a branch of medicine that focuses on the care of the musculoskeletal system

name: Radiology
detail: Radiology is a branch of medicine that uses imaging technology to diagnose and treat disease.

name: Hematology
detail: Hematology is the branch of medicine concerned with the study of the cause, prognosis, treatment.
